abstract: Mr. Hamrick worked on grassroots efforts for Mr. Obama in New Hampshire and South Carolina during the primaries in 2008, and later in Michigan and Pennsylvania during the general election.

headline.main: Martin O’Malley Taps Dave Hamrick, Obama Veteran, as Campaign Manager

snippet: Mr. Hamrick worked on grassroots efforts for Mr. Obama in New Hampshire and South Carolina during the primaries in 2008, and later in Michigan and Pennsylvania during the general election.
